Header.title: Know your UNIQUE BODY TYPE in < 10 Minutes
Header.paragraph: Wanna know.... Your Personalized Daily Routine Best and Worst Foods for You Prevention of Your Common Diseases

About.paragraph: At SwasthVritta - We are availing our users the platform where they can consult with Ayurveda Doctors and Health Advisors in 18 different Specialties through both Online and Offline modes. Our Mission is reaching the Best Ayurveda Doctors all over globe and avail best of their services for all of our users. SignUp with us to be the part of an Incredible Ecosystem of Health

Prakriti1.question: 2. Are you good at adapting and mixing with a variety of people
4. Are your veins visible on skin ?
Prakriti1.option1: A)Visible (if veins are visible on hands and feet)
Prakriti1.option2: B)Fairly Visible (if veins become visible on effort)
Prakriti1.option3: C)Not visible (If veins not visible even on effort)

Prakriti1.question: 6.When anxious/Tensed, do you know the reason?
12.How’s Your Appetite?
Prakriti1.option1: A)Variable (Sometimes Heavy Diet & Sometimes Less Diet)
Prakriti1.option3: C)Less and Regular (Less Diet & Regular Meals)

Prakriti1.question: 13.Are you comfortable owning to your mistakes.
16.Do you recognize when you are stressed, and can kep calm and resort to solution.
19.Do You recognize when You are Angry, and are you able to avoid losing my temper ?
22.Do You take initiative and are highly motivated, even when You don’t feel like doing something ?
23.When under pressure, are you able to think clearly and stay focused
